attributes.action: Request its Citizens in the United Kingdom  abolish the "Act of Settlement"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This Act, discrimanates against Catholics, a tasteless piece of legislation supported by an unknown number of its Citizens.
If you are truly tolerant of people "Act" sign this Petition.
It is time to move on 450 Years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
